title: Disappearing BE Collector Ward
body: Exact title. I bought my lovely Blue Essence Collector ward asap, however as of right now, it is not available for selection. I have no idea what else this may have happened to in my collection, but I can confirm that at least one thing has disappeared from my collection.

replies.body: Hey, don't worry this is just a visual bug.  There's an issue where players can't see or use the essence collector ward, but it's still in their inventory.  I don't have any eta on a fix but it's a known issue!
